card.name: Gimli
card.property: Damage +1. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Each time Gimli wins a skirmish, you may add a threat to wound a minion (or wound a hunter minion twice).

card.name: Run Until Found
card.property: When you play this condition, place a [Dwarven] token here. Skirmish: Discard this condition from play or remove a [Dwarven] token from here to make a [Dwarven] companion gain hunter 1.

card.name: Thorin
card.property: Tale. Maneuver: Exert a [Dwarven] companion to make the fellowship's current site gain mountain until the regroup phase.

card.name: Arwen
card.property: Bearer must be an [Elven] companion. Archery: If bearer is Arwen, discard 2 [Elven] cards from hand to wound a minion.

card.name: Arwen
card.property: Bearer must be an [Elven] companion. Bearer may bear this hand weapon in addition to 1 other hand weapon. Maneuver: If bearer is Arwen, exert her to draw 2 cards.

card.name: Back to the Light
card.property: To play, exert an [Elven] companion or spot Arwen. Examine the top 5 cards of your draw deck and place any number of them aside. Shuffle the remaining cards into your draw deck and place those cards set aside on top of your draw deck in any order.

card.name: Celebring
card.property: Aid - (2). (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add (2) to transfer this to a companion.) To play, spot 2 [Elven] companions. When you play Celebring, you may play an [Elven] artifact from your deck.

card.name: Elven Armaments
card.property: To play, bearer must not be bearing any possessions. Bearer must be an [Elven] companion. Bearer cannot bear any other possessions. While a unique companion bears this possession, the Free Peoples player may not use archery special abilities and the minion archery total is -1.

card.name: Elven Defender
card.property: While you can spot an [Elven] token, this companion is strength +2.

card.name: Elven Supplies
card.property: Fellowship: Remove a culture token from a Free Peoples card to add an [Elven] token here. Skirmish: Remove 2 [Elven] tokens from here to make a minion skirmishing an [Elven] companion strength -1.

card.name: Galadriel
card.property: To play, spot Galadriel or Celeborn. While Galadriel is the Ring-bearer, she is strength +2 and resistance +2. Each time you play an [Elven] skirmish event, you may reinforce an [Elven] token.

card.name: Gil-galad
card.property: To play, spot 2 [Elven] companions. Maneuver: Add a threat to take an [Elven] skirmish event into hand from your discard pile. Regroup: Remove an [Elven] token to play an [Elven] condition from your discard pile.

card.name: Glorfindel
card.property: Ranger. To play, spot 2 [Elven] companions. Minions skirmishing Glorfindel cannot gain strength bonuses from possessions. Each time Glorfindel wins a skirmish, you may remove a threat.

card.name: Haldir
card.property: Skirmish: Exert Haldir or discard an [Elven] card from hand to make a minion skirmishing Haldir strength -2.

card.name: Lembas Bread
card.property: To play, spot 2 [Elven] companions. Bearer must be a companion. Regroup: Discard this possession from play to reconcile your hand.

card.name: Miruvore
card.property: Add 2 threats to heal an [Elven] companion.

card.name: Woodhall Elf
card.property: Aid - (2). (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add (2) to transfer this to a companion.) When you transfer this to an [Elven] companion, you may draw 3 cards.

card.name: Beorning Axe
card.property: Bearer must be a [Gandalf] Man. While Grimbeorn is bearing this possession, each time he wins a skirmish, you may take a [Gandalf] card from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Drawn to Full Height
card.property: Spell. Spot a [Gandalf] Wizard to make a minion lose all strength bonuses from possessions.

card.name: Ents Marching
card.property: If the fellowship is in region 1 or region 2, exert 2 Ents to make an Ent defender +1 until the regroup phase. If the fellowship is in region 3, spot a [Gandalf] companion to draw a card.

card.name: Last Stand
card.property: Fellowship: Exert a [Gandalf] Man to add 2 [Gandalf] tokens here. Skirmish: Remove 3 [Gandalf] tokens from here to make a companion strength +3.

card.name: Librarian
card.property: While you can spot 2 [Gandalf] tokens, each of your [Gandalf] Men is strength +2. Regroup: Discard a follower from play to choose one: draw a card; or take a [Gandalf] skirmish event from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: One-Upsmanship
card.property: Spell. Spot 2 pipeweed cards to remove a burden for each [Gandalf] Wizard you can spot.

card.name: Our Time
card.property: Spell. To play, exert Gandalf. When you play this condition, remove (3). At the start of the maneuver phase, add (4) and remove this condition from the game.

card.name: Perspective
card.property: Maneuver: Add 2 threats and spot a Wizard to spot a minion in play. That minion cannot use special abilities until the regroup phase.

card.name: Radagast
card.property: Bearer must be a [Gandalf] Wizard. Each time you play a [Gandalf] spell, you may exert bearer to wound a minion.

card.name: Ship of Smoke
card.property: Pipeweed. Each time you play a pipeweed card, you may spot Gandalf to reveal the top 3 cards of your draw deck. Take all Free Peoples cards revealed into hand and discard the remaining cards.

card.name: Countless Cords
card.property: Spot Shelob to make a minion strength +1 for each threat you can spot.

card.name: Deceit
card.property: Response: If a Free Peoples player's card is about to discard your other [Gollum] condition, remove (1) to prevent that.

card.name: Enemy in Your Midst
card.property: Heal a Ring-bound companion to reinforce a [Gollum] token.

card.name: It Draws Him
card.property: Spot a [Gollum] card to play a minion. Its twilight cost is -1 (or -3 if it is roaming).

card.name: Not Easily Avoided
card.property: Shadow: Remove (3) to take a [Gollum] card into hand from your draw deck, then randomly discard a card from your hand. Skirmish: Discard a [Gollum] card from hand to make a [Gollum] minion strength +2.

card.name: Set Up
card.property: Spot Gollum or Smeagol to return a follower to its owner's hand.

card.name: Shelob
card.property: Fierce. Each time Shelob wins a skirmish, you may add threats up to the number of burdens you can spot. Each time Shelob wins a skirmish, you may play Gollum from your discard pile; he is strength +3 and fierce until the end of turn.

card.name: Sting of Shelob
card.property: To play, spot Shelob. The Free Peoples player chooses two companions in play (except the Ring-bearer). He or she then chooses to place one of those companions in the dead pile and return the other to his or her hand.

card.name: Time for Food
card.property: If a skirmish event is played, spot Smeagol to cancel that event.

card.name: Trusted Promise
card.property: Reinforce a [Gollum] token. Each Shadow player may draw a card.

card.name: Aragorn

property.name: Subname
property.value: Heir to the Throne of Gondor

card.property: Hunter 2. While you can spot 3 Free Peoples cultures, Aragorn is defender +1. While you can spot 2 Shadow cultures, Aragorn is defender +1.

card.name: Armor of the White City
card.property: Bearer must be a [Gondor] Man. Bearer is a knight.

card.name: Boromir
card.property: Ranger. When you play Boromir (except in your starting fellowship), you may play a possession with a twilight cost of 1 or less on him from your draw deck. Reshuffle your draw deck.

card.name: Crown of Gondor
card.property: To play, spot Aragorn, Elendil, or Isildur. Skirmish: Spot a [Gondor] Man with 3 or more vitality and discard a [Gondor] card from hand to make that Man strength +2.

card.name: Denethor
card.property: Each time the fellowship moves from a site, add a burden. Skirmish: Exert another [Gondor] Man to make him of her strength +1 and damage +1.

card.name: Denethor
card.property: Bearer must be a [Gondor] Man. While bearer is Denethor, his game text does not apply.

card.name: Defenses Long Held
card.property: Make a ranger strength +2 and you may reinforce a [Gondor] token.

card.name: Dunadan
card.property: Bearer must be a [Gondor] ranger. Archery: Discard 2 [Gondor] cards from hand to make the fellowship archery total +1.

card.name: Disarmed
card.property: Bearer cannot bear any Shadow cards. When this condition is transferred to bearer, discard all Shadow cards it bears. Maneuver: Exert a [Gondor] Man or spot a ranger to transfer this condition from your support area to minion.

card.name: Elendil
card.property: Aid - Exert a [Gondor] companion. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may exert a [Gondor] companion to transfer this to a companion.)

card.name: Faramir
card.property: Ranger. Hunter 2. If Faramir is in your starting fellowship, his twilight cost is -1. Maneuver: Exert Faramir to heal another companion with resistance 5 or more.

card.name: Faramir
card.property: Aid - Add a threat. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add a threat to transfer this to a companion.) When you attach this card to a companion, spot a [Gondor] possession to heal that companion.

card.name: The Faithful Stone
card.property: Tale. Each time a non-[Wraith] minion is played, you may spot a Man to put a [Gondor] token here. Maneuver: Remove 3 [Gondor] tokens from here to spot a minion. That minion cannot be assigned to a skirmish until the regroup phase. Any Shadow player may remove (2) to prevent this.

card.name: For Gondor
card.property: Exert a knight to make him or her strength +3.

card.name: Gondorian Servant
card.property: Aid - (1). (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add (1) to transfer this to a companion.) Each time you attach this to a companion, except a [Gondor] Man, add (4).

card.name: Horn of Boromir
card.property: Bearer must be a [Gondor] Man. Maneuver: Exert bearer and discard a follower from play to make bearer strength +4 until the regroup phase (if bearer is Boromir, he is also defender +1 and cannot be overwhelmed unless his strength is tripled).

card.name: Isildur
card.property: Knight. Each time Isildur loses a skirmish, exert a companion. Each time Isildur wins a skirmish, heal a companion.

card.name: Ranger of the North
card.property: Bearer must be a [Gondor] Man. Maneuver: If the fellowship is in region 1 or region 2, you may exert bearer to make him or her defender +1 until the regroup phase. Regroup: Discard this to heal a companion.

card.name: Ranger of the South
card.property: Ranger. While you can spot a [Gondor] token, this companion is strength +2.

card.name: Shield of the White Tree
card.property: Bearer must be a [Gondor] Man. The minion archery total is -1. Regroup: Discard this possession from play to make each opponent shuffle his or her hand into his or her draw deck and draw 8 cards.

card.name: Soldier
card.property: Fortification. At the start of your maneuver phase, you may spot 3 rangers or exert a [Gondor] Man to transfer this condition to a minion. Wound that minion. Regroup: Exert a ranger to reinforce a [Gondor] token.

card.name: Watcher at Sarn Ford
card.property: Ranger. Skirmish: Exert a [Gondor] Man with a resistance 6 or more to make that Man strength +3.

card.name: Corsair Boarding Axe
card.property: Bearer must be a [Men] minion. Skirmish: Remove (3) to reinforce a [Men] token and make bearer fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Corsair Bow
card.property: Bearer must be a [Men] minion. Bearer is an archer. Each time a companion is killed during the archery phase, you may control a site.

card.name: Corsair Grappling Hook
card.property: Bearer must be a [Men] minion. When you play this possession you may reinforce a [Men] token twice. Each time a companion is killed during a skirmish phase, you may control a site.

card.name: Corsair Halberd
card.property: Bearer must be a [Men] minion. Bearer is damage +1. Shadow: Remove a companion in the dead pile from the game to control a site.

card.name: Corsair Scimitar
card.property: Bearer must be a [Men] minion. Bearer is strength +1 for each [Men] token you can spot (limit +5).

card.name: Declined Business
card.property: If the Free Peoples player plays a companion, discard a [Men] card from hand to return that companion to its owner's hand.

card.name: Fleet of Corsair Ships
card.property: When you play this possession, you may add a [Men] token here. Regroup: Remove 4 [Men] tokens from here to place a [Men] card from your discard pile on the top of your draw deck.

card.name: Grima
card.property: Regroup: Exert Grima to add (2). Regroup: Remove a [Men] token to add (2). Regroup: Remove (4) to exert an unbound companion.

card.name: Harry Goatleaf
card.property: While the fellowship is in region 1, this minion is strength +4. While the fellowship is in region 2, this minion is strength +2.

card.name: Henchman
card.property: Bearer must be a [Men] minion. Bearer may bear this hand weapon in addition to 1 other hand weapon.

card.name: Ill News Is An Ill Guest
card.property: Exert a [Men] minion to discard a follower from play (if you can spot Grima, also draw a card).

card.name: Mumakil Commander
card.property: While at a battleground, this minion is strength +2. Each mounted Man is strength +1. Regroup: Shuffle any number of your [Men] mounts in play into your draw deck.

card.name: Ruffian
card.property: While the fellowship is in region 1, this minion is strength +4. While the fellowship is in region 2, this minion is strength +2.

card.name: Rough Man of the South
card.property: While the fellowship is in region 1, this minion is strength +4. While the fellowship is in region 2, this minion is strength +2.

card.name: Squint-eyed Southerner
card.property: While the fellowship is in region 1, this minion is strength +4. While the fellowship is in region 2, this minion is strength +2.

card.name: Ted Sandyman
card.property: Maneuver: Liberate a site you control to make each [Men] minion strength +2 until the regroup phase. Regroup: Exert Ted Sandyman to stack a [Men] Man in play on a possession.

card.name: Treachery
card.property: Spot Grima to exert an unbound companion. That companion cannot use his or her game text until the regroup phase.

card.name: Whisper in the Dark
card.property: Bearer must be a follower. At the start of the maneuver phase, if you can spot a [Men] Man, the Free Peoples player must exert an unbound companion.

card.name: Destroyers and Usurpers
card.property: While you can spot an [Orc] minion and fewer minions than companions, each companion loses all defender bonuses and cannot gain defender bonuses. Maneuver: Spot 2 [Orc] minions to make the fellowship's current site gain battleground until the regroup phase.

card.name: Frenzy of Arrows
card.property: Spot an [Orc] archer minion to add 2 to the minion archery total. If you do, you may add an additional 2 to the minion archery total for each follower you can spot.

card.name: Gothmog
card.property: Each the fellowship and minion archery totals are +3. Regroup: Remove (2) to play an [Orc] minion from your discard pile. That minion comes into play exhausted.

card.name: Gothmog
card.property: Bearer must be an [Orc] Orc with strength 9 or less (or bearer must be Gothmog). Bearer is fierce. While bearer is Gothmog, he is damage +1 in fierce skirmishes.

card.name: Grond
card.property: To play, spot an [Orc] minion. Each time the fellowship moves in the regroup phase, you may discard this possession to search the Free Peoples player's draw deck and choose 2 Free Peoples cards found there. Remove those cards from the game.

card.name: Gruesome Meal
card.property: Make a companion skirmishing an [Orc] minion strength -2 (or -3 if he or she is an archer).

card.name: Orkish Ax
card.property: Bearer must be an [Orc] Orc. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may add a threat.

card.name: Orkish Aggressor
card.property: While at a battleground, this minion is strength +2.

card.name: Orkish Archer Troop
card.property: To play, spot an [Orc] card. The minion archery total is +1 for each hunter companion you can spot.

card.name: Orkish Breeder
card.property: Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Shadow: Exert this minion to play an [Uruk-hai] hunter at twilight cost -2.

card.name: Orkish Defender
card.property: While the fellowship is at a battleground or underground site, this minion cannot take wounds in the archery phase.

card.name: Orkish Headsman
card.property: Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) This minion is strength +3 for each companion in the dead pile (limit +6).

card.name: Orkish Skirmisher
card.property: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may exert him twice to wound a companion.

card.name: Orkish Sneak
card.property: Assignment: Spot another [Orc] Orc to assign this minion to skirmish a non-[Shire] Ring-bearer. The Free Peoples player may add a burden or exert the Ring-bearer twice to discard this minion.

card.name: War Preparations
card.property: Remove a threat to reinforce an [Orc] token.

card.name: Wary Orc
card.property: This minion is strength +1 for each hunter companion you can spot.

card.name: Cast From the Hall
card.property: Each time you play a [Rohan] possession from hand, add a [Rohan] token here. Skirmish: Remove 3 [Rohan] tokens from here to make a [Rohan] companion strength +1 and damage +1.

card.name: Eomer
card.property: Bearer must be a [Rohan] Man. If bearer is mounted, he or she is strength +1. Archery: If bearer is Eomer, exert him to choose a Shadow player who must exert one of his or her minions.

card.name: Erkenbrand
card.property: Bearer must be a [Rohan] Man. Fellowship: Exert bearer to play a follower from your draw deck. Reshuffle your draw deck. Skirmish: Discard a follower from play to make bearer strength +4 (if bearer is Erkenbrand, he is strength +5 instead).

card.name: Erkenbrand
card.property: Bearer must be a [Rohan] Man. The minion archery total is -1. Skirmish: If bearer is Erkenbrand, you may add (2) to cancel a fierce skirmish involving him. Response: If a [Rohan] Man is about to take a wound, spot Gandalf and exert bearer to prevent that wound.

card.name: Fall back to Helm
card.property: If the fellowship is at a plains site, exert a [Rohan] companion to return a minion to its owner's hand.

card.name: Gamling
card.property: Valiant. Skirmish: Transfer a [Rohan] possession that Gamling can bear to him.

card.name: Gamling
card.property: Bearer must be a [Rohan] Man or Merry. Skirmish: Discard a follower from play to make bearer strength +4. If bearer is Gamling, you may also spot another companion to make him or her strength +4 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Precise Attack
card.property: Discard a [Rohan] possession from play to choose one: Wound an unwounded minion; exert a minion; or discard a Shadow card the Ring-bearer is bearing.

card.name: Rohirrim Diadem
card.property: To play, spot Theoden. Skirmish: Spot a [Rohan] Man bearing a possession and discard a [Rohan] possession from hand to make that Man strength +2.

card.name: Rohirrim Recruit
card.property: Valiant. While you can spot a [Rohan] token, this companion is strength +2.

card.name: Surrendered Weapons
card.property: Each time the fellowship moves, you may spot a [Rohan] companion to discard a possession a character is bearing from play. Skirmish: Add (1) to transfer a [Rohan] possession borne by a companion to another eligible bearer.

card.name: Theoden
card.property: While you can spot Gandalf, Theoden is resistance +2. While you can spot Eomer, Theoden is damage +1. While you can spot 3 mounted [Rohan] companions, Theoden is strength +2.

card.name: A Dragon
card.property: Tale. To play, spot a Hobbit. Maneuver: Discard a tale from play to choose a Shadow player who must exert one of his or her minions.

card.name: Fredegar Bolger
card.property: While the fellowship is in region 1 and you can spot 2 other [Shire] companions, Fredegar Bolger is strength +3.

card.name: Golden Perch Ale
card.property: Each time a [Shire] companion wins a skimish, you may add a [Shire] token here. Fellowship: Remove a [Shire] token here to remove a burden.

card.name: Make a Run For It
card.property: Remove 2 [Shire] tokens to cancel a skirmish involving an unbound Hobbit.

card.name: Prized Lagan
card.property: At the start of each turn, you may add (2) to heal a [Shire] companion. Maneuver: Add a threat to spot a minion. That minion loses fierce and cannot gain fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Robin Smallburrow
card.property: Aid - (2). (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add (2) to transfer this to a companion.) Each time you attach this follower to a [Shire] companion, you may discard X cards from hand to draw X cards.

card.name: Scouring of the Shire
card.property: Tale. When there are 4 [Shire] tokens here, discard this condition from play. Response: If a [Shire] condition or [Shire] possession is about to be discarded from play by a Shadow card, add a [Shire] token here to prevent that.

card.name: Sting
card.property: Bearer must be Bilbo or Frodo. Regroup: Exert bearer to remove a threat.

card.name: Cleaved
card.property: Regroup: Exert an [Uruk-hai] hunter twice to transfer this condition from your support area to an unbound companion. Archery: Spot an [Uruk-hai] minion to transfer this condition from your support area to a Free Peoples archer.

card.name: Final Triumph
card.property: Spot your Uruk-hai skirmishing a companion to use vitality to resolve that skirmish instead of strength.

card.name: Fury of the Evil Army
card.property: Bearer must be an [Uruk-hai] minion. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may choose one: discard a follower from play; heal an [Uruk-hai] minion; or control a site.

card.name: Ghastly Wound
card.property: Make an [Uruk-hai] minion strength +2 and damage +1.

card.name: Lurtz
card.property: Archer. Damage +1. Maneuver: Spot 6 companions to make Lurtz fierce until the regroup phase. Assignment: Exert Lurtz twice to assign it to an unbound companion. The Free Peoples player may exert that companion or add a burden to prevent this.

card.name: Lurtz
card.property: Bearer must be an Uruk-hai. When you play this possession on Lurtz, you may draw a card. Archery: If bearer is Lurtz, discard 2 [Uruk-hai] cards from hand to exert an unbound companion.

card.name: New Forges Built
card.property: Exert an [Uruk-hai] minion to reinforce an [Uruk-hai] token.

card.name: Pikes Upon Pikes
card.property: Each [Uruk-hai] minion bearing a hand weapon cannot take wounds during the archery phase. Skirmish: Discard this condition from play to make an [Uruk-hai] minion bearing a possession strength +2.

card.name: Shagrat
card.property: Damage +1. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) While you can spot 7 possessions, Shagrat is fierce and cannot take wounds (except during skirmish phases).

card.name: Tracking the Prize
card.property: While you can spot 3 [Uruk-hai] The hunters, at the start of each skirmish involving an [Uruk-hai] hunter, each companion skirmishing that minion must exert.

card.name: White Hand Attacker
card.property: Damage +1. While at a battleground, this minion is strength +2.

card.name: White Hand Exorciser
card.property: Damage +1. When you play this minion, you may heal an [Uruk-hai] minion.

card.name: White Hand Marchers
card.property: Damage +1. This minion is strength +1 for each other [Uruk-hai] minion you can spot.

card.name: White Hand Marshal
card.property: Damage +1. Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may control a site.

card.name: White Hand Mystic
card.property: Damage +1. Response: If an [Uruk-hai] minion is about to take a wound, exert this minion to prevent that wound.

card.name: White Hand Sieger
card.property: Damage +1. To play, spot an [Uruk-hai] minion and you must control a site.

card.name: White Hand Traveler
card.property: Damage +1. Skirmish: Spot 2 other [Uruk-hai] minions and remove (2) to make this minion strength +1 and damage +1.

card.name: White Hand Uruk
card.property: Damage +1. To play, spot an [Uruk-hai] minion.

card.name: All Life Flees
card.property: To play, spot a Nazgul. Remove (X) to choose one: discard a follower from play that has a twilight cost of X; or play from deck a [Wraith] minion that has a twilight cost of X.

card.name: Pull of the Ring
card.property: Remove a burden to choose one: assign a [Wraith] minion to a companion who has resistance 0; or have a [Wraith] minion lose fierce and gain hunter 2 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Doorway to Doom
card.property: Mountain. When the fellowship moves to this site, each player wounds two of his characters.

card.name: Foot of Mount Doom
card.property: Mountain. Each card that is about to be placed into the discard pile is removed from the game instead.

card.name: Mithlond
card.property: River. When the fellowship moves to this site, each player heals each of his or her characters.

card.name: Morannon Plains
card.property: Battleground. Plains. When the fellowship moves to this site, each player may reinforce a culture token.

card.name: Sirannon Ruins
card.property: River.

card.name: Steward
card.property: Wounds cannot be prevented or healed. Burdens cannot be removed.

card.name: Streets of Bree
card.property: Dwelling. While the fellowship is at this site, followers cannot be transfered to a character.

card.name: Arwen
card.property: Bearer must be an [Elven] companion. Archery: If bearer is Arwen, discard 2 [Elven] cards from hand to wound a minion.

card.name: Arwen
card.property: Bearer must be an [Elven] companion. Bearer may bear this hand weapon in addition to 1 other hand weapon. Maneuver: If bearer is Arwen, exert her to draw 2 cards.

card.name: Galadriel
card.property: To play, spot Galadriel or Celeborn. While Galadriel is the Ring-bearer, she is strength +2 and resistance +2. Each time you play an [Elven] skirmish event, you may reinforce an [Elven] token.

card.name: Beorning Axe
card.property: Bearer must be a [Gandalf] Man. While Grimbeorn is bearing this possession, each time he wins a skirmish, you may take a [Gandalf] card from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Radagast
card.property: Bearer must be a [Gandalf] Wizard. Each time you play a [Gandalf] spell, you may exert bearer to wound a minion.

card.name: Shelob
card.property: Fierce. Each time Shelob wins a skirmish, you may add threats up to the number of burdens you can spot. Each time Shelob wins a skirmish, you may play Gollum from your discard pile; he is strength +3 and fierce until the end of turn.

card.name: Crown of Gondor
card.property: To play, spot Aragorn, Elendil, or Isildur. Skirmish: Spot a [Gondor] Man with 3 or more vitality and discard a [Gondor] card from hand to make that Man strength +2.

card.name: Denethor
card.property: Bearer must be a [Gondor] Man. While bearer is Denethor, his game text does not apply.

card.name: Watcher at Sarn Ford
card.property: Ranger. Skirmish: Exert a [Gondor] Man with a resistance 6 or more to make that Man strength +3.

card.name: Gothmog
card.property: Each the fellowship and minion archery totals are +3. Regroup: Remove (2) to play an [Orc] minion from your discard pile. That minion comes into play exhausted.

card.name: Erkenbrand
card.property: Bearer must be a [Rohan] Man. Fellowship: Exert bearer to play a follower from your draw deck. Reshuffle your draw deck. Skirmish: Discard a follower from play to make bearer strength +4 (if bearer is Erkenbrand, he is strength +5 instead).

card.name: Erkenbrand
card.property: Bearer must be a [Rohan] Man. The minion archery total is -1. Skirmish: If bearer is Erkenbrand, you may add (2) to cancel a fierce skirmish involving him. Response: If a [Rohan] Man is about to take a wound, spot Gandalf and exert bearer to prevent that wound.

card.name: Rohirrim Diadem
card.property: To play, spot Theoden. Skirmish: Spot a [Rohan] Man bearing a possession and discard a [Rohan] possession from hand to make that Man strength +2.

card.name: Theoden
card.property: While you can spot Gandalf, Theoden is resistance +2. While you can spot Eomer, Theoden is damage +1. While you can spot 3 mounted [Rohan] companions, Theoden is strength +2.

card.name: Fredegar Bolger
card.property: While the fellowship is in region 1 and you can spot 2 other [Shire] companions, Fredegar Bolger is strength +3.

card.name: Sting
card.property: Bearer must be Bilbo or Frodo. Regroup: Exert bearer to remove a threat.

card.name: Shagrat
card.property: Damage +1. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) While you can spot 7 possessions, Shagrat is fierce and cannot take wounds (except during skirmish phases).

card.name: Pull of the Ring
card.property: Remove a burden to choose one: assign a [Wraith] minion to a companion who has resistance 0; or have a [Wraith] minion lose fierce and gain hunter 2 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Beorning Axe
card.property: Bearer must be a [Gandalf] Man. While Grimbeorn is bearing this possession, each time he wins a skirmish, you may take a [Gandalf] card from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Radagast
card.property: Bearer must be a [Gandalf] Wizard. Each time you play a [Gandalf] spell, you may exert bearer to wound a minion.

card.name: Crown of Gondor
card.property: To play, spot Aragorn, Elendil, or Isildur. Skirmish: Spot a [Gondor] Man with 3 or more vitality and discard a [Gondor] card from hand to make that Man strength +2.

card.name: Denethor
card.property: Bearer must be a [Gondor] Man. While bearer is Denethor, his game text does not apply.

card.name: Watcher at Sarn Ford
card.property: Ranger. Skirmish: Exert a [Gondor] Man with a resistance 6 or more to make that Man strength +3.

card.name: Erkenbrand
card.property: Bearer must be a [Rohan] Man. Fellowship: Exert bearer to play a follower from your draw deck. Reshuffle your draw deck. Skirmish: Discard a follower from play to make bearer strength +4 (if bearer is Erkenbrand, he is strength +5 instead).

card.name: Erkenbrand
card.property: Bearer must be a [Rohan] Man. The minion archery total is -1. Skirmish: If bearer is Erkenbrand, you may add (2) to cancel a fierce skirmish involving him. Response: If a [Rohan] Man is about to take a wound, spot Gandalf and exert bearer to prevent that wound.

card.name: Rohirrim Diadem
card.property: To play, spot Theoden. Skirmish: Spot a [Rohan] Man bearing a possession and discard a [Rohan] possession from hand to make that Man strength +2.

card.name: Pull of the Ring
card.property: Remove a burden to choose one: assign a [Wraith] minion to a companion who has resistance 0; or have a [Wraith] minion lose fierce and gain hunter 2 until the regroup phase.
